alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; Western Clay (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 6:07PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern St. Johns and northeastern Clay Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 607 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fleming Island, or near Green Cove Springs, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Orange Park, Green Cove Springs, Fruit Cove, Fleming Island, Doctors Inlet, Lakeside, Switzerland, Penney Farms and Asbury Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; Western Clay
